message.content:
cs.IR, cs.SI, cs.LG, cs.HC, cs.CY 

This paper is likely to belong to the Information Retrieval (cs.IR) sub-category as it deals with generating recommendations for web surfers in search of information. The use of entropy-based similarity measure also suggests a focus on data analysis and machine learning, which are common topics in the Machine Learning (cs.LG) and Social and Information Networks (cs.SI) sub-categories. Additionally, the paper discusses the implementation of an online user-based system, which could fall under the Human-Computer Interaction (cs.HC) sub-category. Finally, the paper's focus on personalized recommendations and the use of entropy-based similarity measure could also suggest a connection to the Cybersecurity (cs.CY) sub-category, as personalized recommendations can be used to improve security by reducing the risk of users accessing malicious content.
